item.description: This meetup will bring artist and models together for a 3hr drawing marathon. The purpose of this meeting is to give artists and models a chance to interact with each other and to have a fun afternoon of making art together. There will be multiple models that will rotate in and out of the session at will. We are having a meeting of models only prior to the drawing session to give new and aspiring models a chance to become comfortable and get training and tips from more experienced models. This will be an opportunity for them to get in front of a group of artist. I have participated as a model in other marathons like this and it has always been a lot of fun. I hope that you will come join us. There will be a $5 minimum donation requested to cover the cost of the venue and refreshments.
item.name: Drawing Marathon
